message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $16,000.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $14,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I value this product highly, I can be somewhat flexible. How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $13,000 for the product.
Bob, it seems like we're getting closer. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $14,500. I believe this offer represents a fair compromise for both of us.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. Based on my budget and considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $13,500 for the product.
